meanings.definition: The state or quality of being continuous.
meanings.sent1: The continuousnesses of the river's flow was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent2: The continuousnesses of the music helped me relax.
meanings.sent3: The continuousnesses of the cat's purring put me to sleep.
meanings.sent4: The continuousnesses of time never ceases to amaze me.
meanings.sent5: The continuousnesses of the waves crashing on the shore was soothing.

meanings.definition: The uninterrupted or unbroken connection or extension of something.
meanings.sent1: The continuousnesses of the road stretched out before us.
meanings.sent2: The continuousnesses of the internet allows us to stay connected.
meanings.sent3: The continuousnesses of the phone line kept us talking for hours.
meanings.sent4: The continuousnesses of friendship bridges any distance.
meanings.sent5: The continuousnesses of the thread held the fabric together.
